attributes.title: First Fishing Trip I
attributes.description: Everyone has had a go fishing but I have not had a real go yet. I have invited some friends over so I need some practice, can you teach me?

attributes.text: Catch any 2 items from the sea
Fish 4 times using the Squid Hook
Sell __total Yellow Croakers from the Barn

attributes.title: First Fishing Trip I
attributes.description: Good job! It's true that practice makes perfect.

attributes.title: First Fishing Trip I
attributes.description: Everyone has had a go fishing but I have not had a real go yet. I have invited some friends over so I need some practice, can you teach me?

attributes.text: Catch any 2 items from the sea
Fish 4 times using the Squid Hook

attributes.title: First Fishing Trip I
attributes.description: Good job! It's true that practice makes perfect.

attributes.title: First Fishing Trip II
attributes.description: My friends are arriving for some fishing later so I need to get some of my jobs done before the fun starts, can you help me?

attributes.title: First Fishing Trip II
attributes.description: That's some of the jobs done. I always have to do hard work before I can have some fun, but it's worth it.

attributes.title: First Fishing Trip III
attributes.description: My friends have arrived to try some fishing. Do you want to come along as well?

attributes.text: Fish 7 times using the Squid Hook

attributes.title: First Fishing Trip III
attributes.description: Wow, I think I am pretty good! I am better than some of my friends but they have only just started. One of them caught an old boot!

attributes.title: First Fishing Trip IV
attributes.description: My friends are going to spend the whole day fishing, so lucky! I need to do some more jobs because I didn't finish them all earlier.

attributes.title: First Fishing Trip IV
attributes.description: Excellent! This corn will sell well in the shop and make Grandma happy.

attributes.title: First Fishing Trip V
attributes.description: My girlfriend is also fishing at the moment. I hope she is not too annoyed because I have jobs to do. I can give her a rose :)

attributes.text: Have 3 Lychee Trees on your farm

attributes.title: First Fishing Trip V
attributes.description: My girlfriend loved the rose. I am back in her good books now.

attributes.title: First Fishing Trip VI
attributes.description: My friends are having a competition now. They all want to try and catch the old boot. Let's see if we can catch it first.

attributes.title: First Fishing Trip VI
attributes.description: I won! I got the boot! However, I would have preferred a tasty fish. Maybe I can trick Felicia into eating the boot haha

attributes.title: First Fishing Trip VII
attributes.description: Grandma just shouted. Back to some more jobs. I need to check on the nectar.

attributes.text: Collect __total jars of Nectar from the Butterfly House

attributes.title: First Fishing Trip VII
attributes.description: All the jars are ready to be sold. Grandma is happy and I can go back to fishing again :)

attributes.title: First Fishing Trip VIII
attributes.description: My friends want to challenge me again. Do you want to see if you have more skills?

attributes.text: Catch 5 fish at the Fishing Pier
Catch 1 item in less than 5 taps
Catch 2 fish which are at least 1 star in weight

attributes.title: First Fishing Trip VIII
attributes.description: I'm still the champions haha. What are we going to do with all this tasty fish? We will have to cook it soon.

attributes.title: First Fishing Trip IX
attributes.description: Urgh, Grandma is annoying me, still some more jobs to do. However, she says these are the last ones and then I can finally play with my friends for the rest of the day. Let's try and get them done asap!

attributes.title: First Fishing Trip IX
attributes.description: I just need to get this all to the shop and then it's time for another fishing competition.

attributes.title: First Fishing Trip X
attributes.description: We have decided to have a biggest catch competition. I hope I can win and beat my friends.

attributes.text: Catch 2 items which are two stars in weight
Catch 1 item in less than 7 taps
Fish 3 times with the Bone Fishhook

attributes.title: First Fishing Trip X
attributes.description: Wow, you're a fishing professional! Now I can cook a lovely dinner for my girlfriend. I might need Felicia's help though...

attributes.title: Holy Smokes I
attributes.description: Holy Smokes! What can we do with all this fish? Darryl and his friends have caught loads.

attributes.text: Have a Salt Pond on your farm
Have a Smoke House on your farm

attributes.title: Holy Smokes I
attributes.description: Excellent! Now we can start to cook all this fish.

attributes.title: Holy Smokes II
attributes.description: One of the best fishes to smoke is the yellow croaker. It's a shame Darryl didn't manage to catch more of these.

attributes.title: Holy Smokes II
attributes.description: Wow! Watch out, it's really big! Be careful it doesn't wriggle away.

attributes.title: Holy Smokes III
attributes.description: I think we are one of the first farms to offer smoked fish. I hope our customers will like what we make.

attributes.text: Add 3 Yellow Croakers to the Smoke House
Add 3 Salt to the Smoke House
Collect 3 Smoked Yellow Croakers from the Smoke House

attributes.title: Holy Smokes III
attributes.description: That looks good. I hope they will sell well in the shop!

attributes.title: Holy Smokes IV
attributes.description: How about some smoked Hairtail?

attributes.text: Add 1 Hairtail to the Smoke House

attributes.title: Holy Smokes IV
attributes.description: All this fish is new to me so I had a sneaky taste test. But luckily it tastes good hehe

attributes.title: Holy Smokes V
attributes.description: I have a friend coming later to test some of the new smoked fish. So let's make some more.

attributes.text: Add 1 Tilapia to the Smoke House

attributes.title: Holy Smokes V
attributes.description: I think we need one more dish for my friend to taste. If she likes it, then I know our customers will like it too.

attributes.title: Holy Smokes VI
attributes.description: Flatfish is quite popular, so let's try it. I hope my friend likes it.

attributes.text: Add 1 Flatfish to the Smoke House

attributes.title: Holy Smokes VI
attributes.description: This all worked really well. I think we have decided on our new products to sell, because my friend said everything was delicious.

attributes.title: Farm Movie Fest I
attributes.description: Hey, did you hear about the Movie Festival? I would love to go, but it's so far... Wait, I got an idea. Let's make our own Farm Movie Fest! We just need to invite some friends and prepare some tasty snacks!

attributes.text: Have a Stone Mailbox on your farm
Have 2 Cinnamon Trees on your farm

attributes.title: Farm Movie Fest I
attributes.description: I really hope a lot of people will join our Farm Movie Fest!

attributes.title: Farm Movie Fest II
attributes.description: The first film I want to show is a comedy movie from the Netherlands. Let's treat our audience with some Dutch specialties!

attributes.text: Have 5 Lemon Trees on your farm

attributes.title: Farm Movie Fest II
attributes.description: Hahaha, I laughed so much during this movie! I never knew Dutch comedies were so funny!

attributes.title: Farm Movie Fest III
attributes.description: I thought everyone would leave after the movie, but it seems like they want to stay a bit longer and talk about the movie. Quick, bring some drinks and snacks!

attributes.title: Farm Movie Fest III
attributes.description: Phew, that was close! Luckily my neighbors were so busy talking about the movie that they didn't notice I ran out of drinks and snacks!

attributes.title: Farm Movie Fest IV
attributes.description: I need to prepare better for tomorrow! I'll take care of the snacks and you make the drinks, okay?

attributes.title: Farm Movie Fest IV
attributes.description: Thank you! This should be enough drinks for tomorrow night!

attributes.title: Farm Movie Fest V
attributes.description: Today is a children's movie day! I am confident that all the children will love my blackberry jam! Let's hurry up and prepare all the jam before they arrive!

attributes.title: Farm Movie Fest V
attributes.description: Oh, the children were adorable. They loved the movie and laughed a lot!

attributes.title: Farm Movie Fest VI
attributes.description: The parents haven't arrived yet to pick up their children. So they still have some time left to play pirates and mermaids. Let's cook some delicious seafood snacks for them!

attributes.title: Farm Movie Fest VI
attributes.description: Arrr! The children had a great afternoon. Everyone left with a smile on their face!

attributes.title: Farm Movie Fest VII
attributes.description: Look at the sundial. It's time to get ready for the next movie! This one will be a bit scarier. It's a horror movie about vampires... Are you scared?

attributes.text: Have a Sundial on your farm

attributes.title: Farm Movie Fest VII
attributes.description: Oh, I am already shaking. I'm not sure if I can watch a scary movie...

attributes.title: Farm Movie Fest VIII
attributes.description: The movie was scary, but also amazing at the same time. Alright, let's get some drinks and ask everyone how they liked it!

attributes.title: Farm Movie Fest VIII
attributes.description: Grape juice and champagne are for the vampire lovers, orange juice is for the one who has to drive home!

attributes.title: Farm Movie Fest IX
attributes.description: Now let's prepare some oriental dishes for the last movie: The flying carpet! I have no idea what the movie is about, but I know a few things about eastern cuisine!

attributes.title: Farm Movie Fest IX
attributes.description: Ta-da! Nobody will be able to resist these dishes. But hopefully they will pay some attention to the movie as well, haha.

attributes.title: Farm Movie Fest X
attributes.description: After showing all the movies, it's up to the judges to decide which one they liked the most. We should get them some special snacks so they are in a good mood!

attributes.text: Fish 30 times with the Squid Hook

attributes.title: Farm Movie Fest X
attributes.description: Our part is done. We did everything we could. Let's wait for the verdict!

attributes.title: Farm Movie Fest XI
attributes.description: The jury couldn't decide. The movies were so different, but all really great. I would say it was a successful week. Let's celebrate it!

attributes.text: Prepare 6 bowls of Boiled Fish with Pickled Cabbage

attributes.title: Farm Movie Fest XI
attributes.description: Thank you for all the help! I hope you've had as much fun as I did!

attributes.title: Beach Party I
attributes.description: My friend and I are having a party at the beach today. I can't wait to see the sea and the beach! Grandma even allowed me to try surfing today!

attributes.text: Have a Surf Board on your farm
Have a Seafood House on your farm
Fish 6 times with the Squid Hook

attributes.title: Beach Party I
attributes.description: Can you smell the wonderful sea breeze? I can't wait for our beach party!

attributes.title: Beach Party II
attributes.description: Wow, I tried my first surfing lesson, it was super fun! But now I am hungry! I should try the seafood, it is the best near the seaside!

attributes.text: Process 6 Crayfish in the Seafood House
Prepare 6 bowls of Steamed Egg with Shrimp

attributes.title: Beach Party II
attributes.description: Yummy! The shrimp dishes were delicious! So fresh!

attributes.title: Beach Party III
attributes.description: The shrimp dishes tasted really good, but now I feel like eating something sweet. I've heard coconut is really popular at the moment!

attributes.text: Have 3 Coconut Trees on your farm

attributes.title: Beach Party III
attributes.description: Good weather, good drinks and cake! What more can you wish for!

attributes.title: Beach Party IV
attributes.description: Felicia taught me some special dishes and I want to present them at the party! Are you ready to cook?

attributes.text: Prepare 10 plates of Spicy Stir-Fried Chicken

attributes.title: Beach Party IV
attributes.description: Thai food was a nice choice! I'm sure everyone will like these dishes!

attributes.title: Beach Party V
attributes.description: The beach party offers a lot of exotic dishes! Have you tried the sweet desserts? It's not a party without some treats!

attributes.text: Have a Candy Machine on your farm
Fish 20 times with the Squid Hook

attributes.title: Beach Party V
attributes.description: You know what? I think lychee candy will be my favorite candy from now on!

attributes.title: Beach Party VI
attributes.description: After the delicious seafood we ate, my friends and I want to go out on the sea and try to catch some fish ourselves!

attributes.text: Fish 6 times with the Bone Fishhook
Prepare 6 plates of Fried Crab Stick
Prepare 6 plates of Creamed Crab Cakes

attributes.title: Beach Party VI
attributes.description: I picked up quite a tan out there! Looking good!

attributes.title: Beach Party VII
attributes.description: The beach party has a theme and we will walk on the red carpet! I'm so excited!

attributes.text: Have a Carpet Top on your farm
Have a Carpet Middle on your farm
Have a Carpet Bottom on your farm

attributes.title: Beach Party VII
attributes.description: Do you think I look like a movie star? It's really an amazing feeling!

attributes.title: Beach Party VIII
attributes.description: I didn't expect so many people to show up for the party! We need more food! Maybe some chilli dishes will do the trick!

attributes.title: Beach Party VIII
attributes.description: We made our own delicious shrimp dishes, but I still feel a little bit hungry...

attributes.title: Beach Party IX
attributes.description: Grandma called to check up on me! When I told her that we still need more dishes, she told me some of her secret recipes!

attributes.title: Beach Party IX
attributes.description: I'm really full with Pad Thai now. I should also cook something for Grandma and Felicia, as a thank you!

attributes.title: Beach Party X
attributes.description: Grandma said a good present to bring from the beach is a special beach fertilizer. The neighbors will be very thankful. We can walk around and try to find some from the small beach vendors.

attributes.text: Fertilize 10 times on your neighbors' farms

attributes.title: Beach Party X
attributes.description: Wow the beach vendors not only had fertilizer, but also some delicious snacks and sweets!

attributes.title: Beach Party XI
attributes.description: Is that a fish market over there? I'll try one more time to catch some extra fish before it's dark. But if the fish don't bite, I'll just buy some fish and tell everyone I caught it, haha!

attributes.text: Fish 30 times with the Treble Hook
Prepare 2 plates of Wasabi Fried Mackerel

attributes.title: Beach Party XI
attributes.description: Everyone loves a seafood platter! I'm sure Grandma and Felicia will love it too!

attributes.title: Beach Party XII
attributes.description: Oh, I almost forgot about our neighbors! I want to surprise them with some Asian seafood dishes! They will love my sushi!

attributes.text: Prepare 3 plates of Crab Roe Warship Sushi

attributes.title: Beach Party XII
attributes.description: It's time to go home. The party was a big success! I'll never forget this beach party!

attributes.title: Recipe for Success I
attributes.description: I think it is time for you to learn more about the beauty shop! Ol' MacDonald's sister will visit us soon and she can teach you everything about it! She specializes in beauty products.

attributes.text: Have a Beauty Shop on your farm

attributes.title: Recipe for Success I
attributes.description: We harvested so many flowers! I wonder which flower she will use for her famous beauty products.

attributes.title: Recipe for Success II
attributes.description: Our farm products are so popular in town that our customers have to pre-order them! Almost everyone loves our beauty and seafood products. Let's make some facial masks!

attributes.text: Craft __total Clay Facial Masks in Beauty Shop
Craft __total Rose Facial Masks in Beauty Shop

attributes.title: Recipe for Success II
attributes.description: With the combination of our secret techniques and our fresh ingredients, the products turned out to be amazing!

attributes.title: Recipe for Success III
attributes.description: While we are completing all the tasks for today, I will tell you the story of how our farm became famous! But please help me finish the tasks for today.

attributes.text: Craft __total Goose Feather Earrings in Beauty Shop

attributes.title: Recipe for Success III
attributes.description: I bet these earrings are going to be a new trend this summer! Ok, back to our story.

attributes.title: Recipe for Success IV
attributes.description: When I was young and didn't have any experience in farming, our farm business wasn't successful and we didn't know how to attract new customers. The only dishes I knew were peach dishes.

attributes.text: Prepare __total bowls of Peche au Caramel

attributes.title: Recipe for Success IV
attributes.description: Wow, that's impressive! Your peach dishes look much better than the ones I made when I was young!

attributes.title: Recipe for Success V
attributes.description: One year our farm almost had no crops. And that was the time when I decided to seek help and advice from experienced farmers. So I went to a Farm Conference to learn about beauty products and seafood!

attributes.text: Prepare __total plates of Crab Meat Yi Mein

attributes.title: Recipe for Success V
attributes.description: We're lucky to always have fresh ingredients straight from the sea!

attributes.title: Recipe for Success VI
attributes.description: I met Ol' MacDonald's sister there and saw her presentation on the 'Usage of a Beauty Shop for successful farming'. I thought that idea was amazing! So after the presentation I asked her for advice on producing beauty products!

attributes.text: Craft __total Red Cord Necklaces in Beauty Shop
Craft __total Pearl Necklaces in Beauty Shop
Craft __total Banana Facial Masks in Beauty Shop

attributes.title: Recipe for Success VI
attributes.description: We've learned how to create beautiful accessories and cosmetics with farm items and items that can be collected from the sea.

attributes.title: Recipe for Success VII
attributes.description: We have not only improved in making beauty products, but we also came up with a new strategy for our seafood dishes! Let's prepare some to see how it tastes!

attributes.text: Produce __total Smoked Mackerel in the Smoke House

attributes.title: Recipe for Success VII
attributes.description: Perfect! These dishes didn't take much time and they are really delicious!

attributes.title: Recipe for Success VIII
attributes.description: With the seafood business growing bigger and bigger, we tried more new products and styles! That was a big success because our farm became famous all over the world for fresh and unique seafood dishes and quality beauty products.

attributes.text: Prepare __total bowls of Boiled Fish with Pickled Cabbage

attributes.title: Recipe for Success VIII
attributes.description: Yummy, these dishes are our family's specialty!

attributes.title: Recipe for Success IX
attributes.description: Since that moment, we always tried new things and were not scared of change! I think this is the secret of success! It is not enough to be a good farmer, it is important to be creative in discovering new possibilities and have good taste!

attributes.text: Prepare __total plates of Mango with Sticky Rice

attributes.title: Recipe for Success IX
attributes.description: Good job! Now you know the secret of a successful farm.

attributes.title: Recipe for Success X
attributes.description: By the way, have you heard about our latest beauty products? All our customers love it! I'm sure you will be blown away too after you try it out yourself.

attributes.text: Fish __total times with the Squid Hook
Process __total Scallops in the Seafood House
Craft __total Pearl Hydrating Masks in the Beauty Shop

attributes.title: Recipe for Success X
attributes.description: Unbelievable! This facial mask is magical! Don't you feel refreshed after using it?

attributes.title: Recipe for Success XI
attributes.description: Now I want you to make something special for Ol' MacDonald's sister. She is the one who helped me discover my recipe for success, and she is the one who introduced me to Ol' MacDonald!

attributes.text: Fish __total times with the Squid Hook
Craft __total Coral Rose Mirrors in Beauty Shop

attributes.title: Recipe for Success XI
attributes.description: Such a special gift! I think you've created a new bestseller!

attributes.title: Felicia's Cooking Stand
attributes.description: We've got a new cooking stand on the farm! I'm so happy! Now I can invite my neighbors to enjoy my delicious food!

attributes.text: Place a Cooking Stand on your farm

attributes.title: Felicia's Cooking Stand
attributes.description: Food's ready! Let's wait for our first customers!

attributes.title: Neighbors' Day I
attributes.description: It's such a beautiful day today! Since it's Neighbors' Day, I have an idea. Let's take a break and invite some neighbors for a picnic in the forest near the lake! Can you help me to finish the work on the farm first?

attributes.title: Neighbors' Day I
attributes.description: The food is great! I really enjoy this lovely day!

attributes.title: Neighbors' Day II
attributes.description: Did you hear that? I think I heard something behind those bushes in the lake... Oh! It's a cute little duck! He looks lost and hungry! But we have already finished all of our food! Can you prepare some more?

attributes.title: Neighbors' Day II
attributes.description: You can see he was really hungry! I wonder what happened with his mom!

attributes.title: Neighbors' Day III
attributes.description: Grandma said we can take care of the little ducky, so cool! But we need to clean up the place, plant some flowers and prepare the habitat for this little fella! We can ask our neighbors for help, because it's a lot of work!

attributes.title: Neighbors' Day III
attributes.description: They are always so helpful! It's good to have such good neighbors!

attributes.title: Neighbors' Day IV
attributes.description: With the help of our neighbors, the pond is almost ready! We should harvest some food for our new little friend. What do you think he'd like to eat?

attributes.title: Neighbors' Day IV
attributes.description: He looks much happier now!

attributes.title: Neighbors' Day V
attributes.description: We couldn't finish the habitat without the help of our neighbors! So let's prepare some gifts and invite them over to see our cute little duck swim in his new home: the duck habitat!

attributes.title: Neighbors' Day V
attributes.description: All of our neighbors showed up and adored the new duck habitat! Thanks for your help and happy Neighbors' Day!

attributes.title: Garden Party I
attributes.description: Summer calls for supper under an open sky! How about we throw a nice little garden party for our friends and neighbors? Everyone's invited! But perhaps we should clean up a bit first...

attributes.title: Garden Party I
attributes.description: Thanks! Now the farm is nice and tidy!

attributes.title: Garden Party II
attributes.description: Do you know what I love most about parties? Planning them! Ah... I can already see our garden beautifully decorated with lights and flowers... It's going to be just perfect!

attributes.title: Garden Party II
attributes.description: It looks fabulous! I should become a professional party planner!

attributes.title: Garden Party III
attributes.description: Obviously, we can't organize a fancy dinner party without anything to eat! Let's go to the kitchen and check out what delicious seasonal dishes we could make for our friends!

attributes.title: Garden Party III
attributes.description: I'm getting hungry just looking at all the food! Oh my, what time is everyone coming? I must resist!

attributes.title: Garden Party IV
attributes.description: From my experience, I can tell you that the key to a successful garden party is a variety of refreshing drinks! Could you help me think of some nice summer drinks?

attributes.title: Garden Party IV
attributes.description: The party is going to be awesome! I can't wait!

attributes.title: Garden Party V
attributes.description: The garden looks amazing! The food and drinks are almost ready and I'm wearing my cutest outfit... But... Where is everyone? Oh, gosh! I forgot to send out the invitations!

attributes.title: Garden Party V
attributes.description: Phew, I had to visit all neighbors, but finally everyone is here! Time to start! Enjoy the party, my friend!

attributes.title: Oil Press Trip I
attributes.description: Last week our teacher asked us to write about our favorite farm product. The best writer will get to choose the next outing destination. The truth is I've never seen an oil press before and my essay won!

attributes.text: Place the Oil Press on your Farm

attributes.title: Oil Press Trip I
attributes.description: Destination: Master Oliver's Farm!! He is the best oil producer in town. Should I bring his poster so he can sign it?

attributes.title: Oil Press Trip II
attributes.description: I'm so excited!! We're gonna leave pretty early in the morning so grandma prepared some snacks and lunch boxes for me. I have the best Grandma in the world! Don't you think?

attributes.title: Oil Press Trip II
attributes.description: Eating from the lunch box makes the food tastier.. I wonder why..

attributes.title: Oil Press Trip III
attributes.description: We're here! Look at those cool buildings over there! The Old Farmer said there are two different ways to extract oil: the classic way and the modern way and... Omg can you smell the flavor of fresh pressed olive oil?

attributes.title: Oil Press Trip III
attributes.description: That was amazing... Fresh olive oil on toasted bread! Simple yet delicious!!

attributes.title: Oil Press Trip IV
attributes.description: So the classic way is typically using vertical millstones moving around a central post to crush or bruise the seeds or fruit which can then be stamped or pressed to extract the oil.. Does it sound complicated as I think?

attributes.text: Have __total Olive Trees on your farm

attributes.title: Oil Press Trip IV
attributes.description: The classic method is cool.. But I'm wondering what can you do with the modern way!!

attributes.title: Oil Press Trip V
attributes.description: The modern way is different. The new oil mill can process 4K tons per day hot pressed or 25 tons cold pressed. They often crush the raw materials continuously, before extracting the oil from the press cake!

attributes.title: Oil Press Trip V
attributes.description: Wow.. There is so much to learn! But Master Oliver's words are so passionate that everyone who hears them will share the love for oil!

attributes.title: Oil Press Trip VI
attributes.description: The Old Farmer challenged us with a game. What we're gonna do is think about a special oil that doesn't exist or we haven't tried yet. And later he will show us how to produce it. Any suggestions?

attributes.title: Oil Press Trip VI
attributes.description: Our idea was good! But spicy flavoured oil?! Wow that was brilliant.. Chapeau!

attributes.title: Oil Press Trip VII
attributes.description: The oil we produced is incredible! We must try and prepare awesome food with it... Oh boy.. I'm drooling already? Who's hungry?

attributes.title: Oil Press Trip VII
attributes.description: Master Oliver said it's getting close to dinner time and suggests to collect all the ingredients we like.. Can he also cook?

attributes.title: Oil Press Trip VIII
attributes.description: Master Oliver is indeed the best! Awesome experience and good explanation! He is my new hero! He even gave us some amazing oil to try. The dinner tonight will be super tasty!

attributes.text: Prepare __total plates of Sweet and Sour Shrimp

attributes.title: Oil Press Trip VIII
attributes.description: I think now we can also try to make oil on our own farm! I can't wait to share everything with Grandma and Felicia! What a great day!

attributes.title: Let's get healthy
attributes.description: My school will start off with a health awareness week! But I don't really like to cook. So lets build a Salad Machine instead! Now we just need to find the right materials.

attributes.text: Complete the Orders on the Order Board
Place a Salad Machine on your farm

attributes.title: Let's get healthy
attributes.description: Thanks for helping! We just need to build it one item at a time!

attributes.title: The Final Touch I
attributes.description: Wow, the Salad Machine is coming along really nicely! But I feel that we're still missing something, but what? I hope Felicia has some nice ideas... Let's go ask her, but first let's feed the animals!

attributes.title: The Final Touch I
attributes.description: I think I'm done here, let's go to see Felicia!

attributes.title: The Final Touch II
attributes.description: Felicia heard about a "Veggie Fair". That would be a great place to get some ideas! But first, let's start with the most important meal of the day. Can you help prepare breakfast?

attributes.text: Prepare __total loaves of Whole Oat Fruit Bread

attributes.title: The Final Touch II
attributes.description: Never knew a healthy breakfast can be delicious too! Thanks for the help!

attributes.title: The Final Touch III
attributes.description: This fair is bigger than I thought! There are so many farmers from all over the world! I think we will see some very cool things here. Where shall we start?

attributes.title: The Final Touch III
attributes.description: I'm getting good ideas already! Let's see what else we can visit!

attributes.title: The Final Touch IV
attributes.description: That looks like a Belgian stand, let's take a look. Mmm... what's in it? Oh, I see, so there's apples, almonds and to top it off: mayonnaise.

attributes.title: The Final Touch IV
attributes.description: What a yummy combination! I would have never thought of this!

attributes.title: The Final Touch V
attributes.description: What's next? This looks really exotic! The farmer said he's from Turkey and he likes to have salad with grains or lentils. Sounds good, let's have a taste!

attributes.title: The Final Touch V
attributes.description: This also tasted delicious. I should try new things more often!

attributes.title: The Final Touch VI
attributes.description: There are still so many stands to visit, but where has Felicia gone to? Oh, there she is! She was looking at some cute wooden buckets for the Salad Machine. That's really sweet of her!

attributes.title: The Final Touch VI
attributes.description: That bucket will be a perfect addition to our Salad Machine!

attributes.title: The Final Touch VII
attributes.description: Ok, I think I have enough inspiration. Let's head home to finish the Salad Machine. I can't wait to show it to Grandma!

attributes.title: The Final Touch VII
attributes.description: Yeah, it's finally finished! Let's show it to everybody and come up with some new and healthy dishes!

attributes.title: Time to scare people!
attributes.description: I am already in a Halloween mood! I love this time of the year; you can wear cool stuff, scare people and you get sweets! I know the right thing for the farm! Can you help me?

attributes.text: Fish __total times with the Halloween Hook

attributes.title: Time to scare people!
attributes.description: Oh that is looking good already! Let's finish this before Halloween!

attributes.title: Harvest Time
attributes.description: Autumn is here and the leaves have already changed to a beautiful yellow and red color! This is the time to appreciate the harvest! Let's prepare some space on our farm to show our appreciation of harvest time!

attributes.title: Harvest Time
attributes.description: This looks great on the farm! I look forward to completing it!

attributes.title: The Biggest Harvest I
attributes.description: Hi Farmer! How do you like the beautiful red maple leaves in the mountains? Our family just came back from the mountains and it is spectacular! I've collected some beautiful leaves for you!

attributes.title: The Biggest Harvest I
attributes.description: I will be super happy if you like the leaves I brought. I wanna make some bookmarks out of them.

attributes.title: The Biggest Harvest II
attributes.description: Oh, you are planning a trip to the mountain as well? Hurry up! I heard there is a storm coming so you might not have a clear view. But there is still some work to be done on the farm. So let's get started!

attributes.title: The Biggest Harvest II
attributes.description: Nice work! I've prepared some food for you. Have a nice trip!

attributes.title: The Biggest Harvest III
attributes.description: Welcome back farmer! How was your trip? Wow! You brought so many fruits home. I heard there is a big festival called "The Last Harvest" in Richard's Orchard in the foothills! Have you been there?

attributes.title: The Biggest Harvest III
attributes.description: Tell me more about the harvest festival please! I really wanna join it. Is it too late?

attributes.title: The Biggest Harvest IV
attributes.description: The Last Harvest sounds really interesting, but unfortunately it already ended in Richard's Orchard. Such a pity... But why don't we hold our own festival? Let's call it The Biggest Harvest!

attributes.title: The Biggest Harvest IV
attributes.description: I want to invite everyone in town!

attributes.title: The Biggest Harvest V
attributes.description: Here's the idea! Let's invite everyone in town and divide everyone into ten teams. We will give every team a list of fruits, crops and products they need to collect. The team that collects most within two hours will win the game!

attributes.title: The Biggest Harvest V
attributes.description: Everything is set up and everyone is ready! I can't wait to watch the big competition!

attributes.title: The Biggest Harvest VI
attributes.description: Can you see how excited everyone is to win the game? I bet Team 1 will be the winner! I love The Biggest Harvest!

attributes.title: The Biggest Harvest VI
attributes.description: Are you looking forward to the winner? Yes, Team 1 is the winner! They will get all they made for free!

attributes.title: Snow Time
attributes.description: Oh wow look, it's snowing! Let’s call Darryl and go out to play in the snow! I love making snow angels, and we'll need all the snow we can get! - Oh no, Darryl used all the good snow to make snowballs!

attributes.text: Complete the Orders on the Order Board

attributes.title: Snow Time
attributes.description: Oh no, the snow is all messed up now. Lets see if we can still find a nice snowy place for making snow angels.

attributes.title: Ice Fishing
attributes.description: Our teacher let us read another Bobo Bear Story. This time he is Ice Fishing. That sounds cool. I want to try this too! Where is the next lake?

attributes.text: Fish __total times with the Squid Hook

attributes.title: Ice Fishing
attributes.description: This was fun. Would love to go Ice Fishing every day! Let's finish some Weekly Activities for more Ice fun.

attributes.title: Lovely Planter Box
attributes.description: Spring is coming soon and with it the Love Season. I want to be prepared with a nice place for some more nice fresh flowers on the farm and for couples to sit!

attributes.title: Lovely Planter Box
attributes.description: Thanks for helping out.

attributes.title: Good Boy 2016 1/16
attributes.description: Time flies so fast. It's already 2016! I want to improve myself to be a better person for grandma, my father, and Felicia. Let's start with my first new year's resolution. Let's prepare breakfast for everyone!

attributes.title: Good Boy 2016 1/16
attributes.description: Mmmm... I can smell that freshly baked Cornbread. Yummy!

attributes.title: Good Boy 2016 2/16
attributes.description: All done. Let's call everyone for breakfast! Hang on I think something is missing. Oh that's right! fresh fruit jam from farm and...yes omelet!

attributes.title: Good Boy 2016 2/16
attributes.description: Enjoy your meal!

attributes.title: Good Boy 2016 3/16
attributes.description: Everyone loves my breakfast! Feel so glad when I see my loved ones happy. Anyway, Tomorrow is a Childen's day and my father said we can organize a party for this special day if we finish all tasks.

attributes.text: Complete the Orders on the Order Board
Fish  __total times using the Squid Hook
Craft __total Clay Facial Masks in Beauty Shop

attributes.title: Good Boy 2016 3/16
attributes.description: We are nearly of our goal!

attributes.title: Good Boy 2016 4/16
attributes.description: Yay! We finally made it! The place checked. Let's go prepare some food farmer. It's a Children's Day so we should have a lot of snack and sweets otherwise kids will get bored!

attributes.title: Good Boy 2016 4/16
attributes.description: The food is ready as well. What's else we need to do?

attributes.title: Good Boy 2016 5/16
attributes.description: Drink is a must for every party and kids always fancy colorful drinks. Why not harvest fruits to make juices? I think after we finish preparing beverage party can be on!

attributes.title: Good Boy 2016 5/16
attributes.description: Well done farmer! Hope everyone will enjoy this party. Happy Children's Day!

attributes.title: Happy Songkran  Day 1
attributes.description: The Hot weather in April make me thinking about a festival in Thailand call Songkran or Thai New Year,is the day that people must be out for splashing water. I wish we can do it in our farm. But now I feel so dry ,let get some juice first!

attributes.title: Happy Songkran  Day 1
attributes.description: Juice always make me fresh and there are benefits too!

attributes.title: Happy Songkran  Day 2
attributes.description: I told grandma about Songkran and she tell me If we can finished all order in farm, we will celebrate this with our neighbours. Oh I need an assistant, Felicia can you help me ?!?

attributes.text: Complete the Orders on the Order Board

attributes.title: Happy Songkran  Day 2
attributes.description: Almost done! can't wait ti see you Songkran!

attributes.title: Happy Songkran  Day 3
attributes.description: Seems like Felicia so hungry.I'd better be prepared lunch for Felicia. Otherwise, she will have no engry for helping me in this afternoon and my dream about Songkran water car can not be ture. I would not decisive!

attributes.text: Fish __total  times with the Squid Hook

attributes.title: Happy Songkran  Day 3
attributes.description: Great food is the best way to start your day! We have plenty of energy now

attributes.title: Happy Songkran  Day 4
attributes.description: Yeah! finally, we have done! now it's time to prepare our Songkran festival. Dad told me that he will drive for us,Nothing is better than this!  So let start from decorate our Songkran water car Hehehe!

attributes.title: Happy Songkran  Day 4
attributes.description: So Colorful!!

attributes.title: Happy Songkran  Day 5
attributes.description: Everthing is ready for the festival! Especially, the water that we gonna use for splash out, it  was fragrant with the scent of chamomile oil. It's time to go now.  I will bring some candy too. We can eat when we hungry and  also can share with our friends.

attributes.title: Happy Songkran  Day 5
attributes.description: Happy Songkran Day everyone !

attributes.title: Into the Woods I
attributes.description: Howdy Farmer! I found something amazing in the woods. It's a Gallery, an ancient place where you can present your farm successes and record all the farm activities. And If you don't believe me, come and see yourself!

attributes.text: Register the Holstein Cow in the Gallery

attributes.title: Into the Woods I
attributes.description: You were right! This gallery is really amazing!

attributes.title: Into the Woods II
attributes.description: I like to present my nice farm in the gallery! But to make the Gallery more beautiful we need more things on the farm to present. Why don't we add some more decorations?

attributes.text: Register a Hay Bale in the Gallery

attributes.title: Into the Woods II
attributes.description: This already looks nicer! Grandma also said now it looks more like a farm!

attributes.title: Into the Woods III
attributes.description: A Gallery with one farm decoration picture is boring. We should add one more! I know the perfect subject: How can we have a rich harvest without a Scarecrow to protect the crops?

attributes.text: Register a Scarecrow in the Gallery

attributes.title: Into the Woods III
attributes.description: Now this looks more like a farm!

attributes.title: Into the Woods IV
attributes.description: Grandma says I'm the best Beekeeper she knows and she suggested me to show it in the Gallery.

attributes.text: Register a Beehive in the Gallery

attributes.title: Into the Woods IV
attributes.description: I am very proud of this! And now everyone who passes the Gallery can see it!

attributes.title: Into the Woods V
attributes.description: Aw!! The Cow produced some more fresh milk.. Milk, milk, milk... Cheese!! What do you think? Do you think we can also present a Cheese master in the gallery?

attributes.text: Add 3 bottles of Milk to the Cheese Master
Register a Cheese Master in the Gallery

attributes.title: Into the Woods V
attributes.description: Yummy cheese! And now everyone knows we make delicious cheese here!

attributes.title: Into the Woods VI
attributes.description: Making the Gallery nice is fascinating but tiring and it made me hungry. What about some sandwiches? First we need some Wheat Flour!

attributes.text: Register a Dutch Mill in the Gallery

attributes.title: Into the Woods VI
attributes.description: That was delicious. But I could still eat a snack!

attributes.title: Into the Woods VII
attributes.description: One apple a day will keep the doctor away. Let's get some apples so Grandma will stop bugging me!
attributes.hint: Register more items in the Gallery to receive more Gallery Points!

attributes.text: Register an Apple Tree in the Gallery

attributes.title: Into the Woods VII
attributes.description: Yummy. Apples are indeed a good snack.

attributes.title: Into the Woods VIII
attributes.description: Now that the Wheat Flour is ready, we need a Baker to bake some bread.

attributes.text: Add 3 bottles of Milk to the Baker
Register a Baker in the Gallery

attributes.title: Into the Woods VIII
attributes.description: Now I am full and the Gallery also looks really nice! What a successful day!

attributes.title: Photographer I
attributes.description: Darryl thinks he did a great job last time with the Gallery. I bet we can do better. With this vintage camera we're gonna take some amazing pictures for the Gallery.

attributes.text: Register a Buffalo in the Gallery

attributes.title: Photographer I
attributes.description: You were right! This camera can take some amazing pictures!

attributes.title: Photographer II
attributes.description: I feel like I'm a professional photographer. Oh right! Before I forget, I've promised Grandma I'll help her with the Jam Machine in return for this beautiful camera. Let's go before she says anything!

attributes.text: Add 3 jars of Honey to a Jam Machine
Add 3 Apples to a Jam Machine
Register a Jam Machine in the Gallery

attributes.title: Photographer II
attributes.description: Just in time! The Jam is delicious and I could take another photo as well!

attributes.title: Photographer III
attributes.description: I can not find a good angle for a nice photo shoot. Don't you think this landscape is a bit empty? How about we add some items and spruce it up?

attributes.text: Get the Stone Road from your Gift Box
Register Stone Road in the Gallery
Register Welcome Sign in the Gallery

attributes.title: Photographer III
attributes.description: Much better! This creates a real farm feeling!

attributes.title: Photographer IV
attributes.description: I took some more pictures of animals and machines. What else can we take pictures of? What about farming tools?

attributes.text: Register a Shovel in the Gallery

attributes.title: Photographer IV
attributes.description: Nice picture! This creates a new perspective!

attributes.title: Photographer V
attributes.description: This photo shooting day has made me a bit tired. An apple juice would be really refreshing right now!

attributes.text: Register a Juice Machine in the Gallery

attributes.title: Photographer V
attributes.description: I feel ready again! Let's find some more other nice things to photograph.

attributes.title: Photographer VI
attributes.description: Hey! Look at that Cropinator! Do you think we can take a good picture with it as well?

attributes.title: Photographer VI
attributes.description: Best picture ever! This tops Darryls work by far! Thanks for the help!

attributes.title: Amusement Park I
attributes.description: The Amusement Park is having its inauguration today! Me and Felicia have been waiting for this event for so long!!! Grandma said we can only go if we help her out with some tasks.

attributes.text: Register the Kitchen in the Gallery

attributes.title: Amusement Park I
attributes.description: Not bad!

attributes.title: Amusement Park II
attributes.description: Now that I think of it, I feel so bad that my buddy Buffalo can't come with us. Let's feed him and cheer him up a bit.

attributes.text: Complete the Fa-moo-ly Set in the Gallery

attributes.title: Amusement Park II
attributes.description: Good! Now I think both Buffalo and the Cow are happy!

attributes.title: Amusement Park III
attributes.description: Well, actually I feel bad for the sweet Sheep too. Let's feed her so she'll be eating and won't notice anything.

attributes.text: Register a Burger Machine in the Gallery

attributes.title: Amusement Park III
attributes.description: Well done! The sheep seems occupied now!

attributes.title: Amusement Park IV
attributes.description: There's so much candy at the Amusement Park. Grandma suggested to bring some fruit in case we want something refreshing. What do you think about some oranges?

attributes.text: Register a Gisela Cherry Tree in the Gallery
Register a Sauce Machine in the Gallery

attributes.title: Amusement Park IV
attributes.description: These oranges will hit the spot!

attributes.title: Amusement Park V
attributes.description: Oh right! Almost forgot that the ducks need to be fed as well. Hope they're not starving already!

attributes.text: Register a Green Duck Pond in the Gallery

attributes.title: Amusement Park V
attributes.description: Quack, quack. The ducks look happy.

attributes.title: Amusement Park VI
attributes.description: Almost done. It is so warm now, I think I need some fruit before finishing the tasks. I think Love Fruits are perfect for regaining some energy!

attributes.text: Register a Peacock in the Gallery

attributes.title: Amusement Park VI
attributes.description: Yummy! These were really good. Even the Peacock wanted to steal some Love Fruits from me.

attributes.title: Amusement Park VII
attributes.description: Last task!!! Amusement Park here we come!!!

attributes.text: Use the Rain from the giftbox

attributes.title: Amusement Park VII
attributes.description: Yeah!!! This will be so fun! And lets take enough pictures to present later to Grandma!

attributes.title: Into the Woods III
attributes.description: A Gallery without tree picture is boring. We should add one more! I know the perfect subject: How can we have a beautiful farm without trees to decorate with?

attributes.text: Register a Maple Tree in the Gallery

attributes.title: Into the Woods III
attributes.description: Now this looks more like a farm!

attributes.title: Photographer IV
attributes.description: I took some more pictures of animals and machines. What else can we take pictures of? What about a new tree?

attributes.text: Register an Orange tree in the Gallery

attributes.title: Photographer IV
attributes.description: Nice picture! This creates a new perspective!

attributes.title: Photographer III
attributes.description: I can not find a good angle for a nice photo shoot. Don't you think this landscape is a bit empty? How about we add some items and spruce it up?

attributes.title: Photographer III
attributes.description: Much better! This creates a real farm feeling!

attributes.title: Into the Woods VIII
attributes.description: Now that the Wheat Flour is ready, we need a Baker to bake some bread.

attributes.text: Register a Baker in the Gallery

attributes.title: Into the Woods VIII
attributes.description: Now I am full and the Gallery also looks really nice! What a successful day!

attributes.title: Into the Woods I
attributes.description: Howdy Farmer! I found something amazing in the woods. It's a Gallery, an ancient place where you can present your farm successes and record all the farm activities. And If you don't believe me, come and see yourself!

attributes.text: Register the Holstein Cow in the Gallery

attributes.title: Into the Woods I
attributes.description: You were right! This gallery is really amazing!

attributes.title: I Smell a New Feature! I
attributes.description: I'm so excited. Dad just told me that if I help him with some tasks, he'll show me a new feature for the Seaside Farm.

attributes.title: I Smell a New Feature! I
attributes.description: I wonder what we'll be able to do on the farm!

attributes.title: I Smell a New Feature! II
attributes.description: Dad said this isn't enough yet! For the new function, he said we need some more nice smelling things. I'm getting curious!

attributes.title: I Smell a New Feature! II
attributes.description: I think this should be enough, or will it? We harvested a great mix of items.

attributes.title: I Smell a New Feature!III
attributes.description: Dad said it's nearly finished! We just need a few more items to complete the whole experience!

attributes.text: Prepare 8 cups of Maple Milk Tea

attributes.title: I Smell a New Feature!III
attributes.description: We did it! Congratulations, the new feature is unlocked!

attributes.title: I Smell a New Feature! IV
attributes.description: Wow, this function is amazing, the smell is so fragrant. I'm sure if you tap on it you'll be able to smell it too!

attributes.text: Plant 20 Clover to try the new feature!
Tap on one matured Clover Crop to smell it!
Tap on the matured Lavender Crop to smell it!

attributes.title: I Smell a New Feature! IV
attributes.description: April Fool's! Hope your phone didn't smell too bad. As a compensation I have a cute decoration for you!

attributes.title: Trading Places I
attributes.description: I made a bet with Felicia on whose tasks are harder. Now I have to do all Felicia's tasks for a day and she'll do mine! And guess what? I'll be working in the flower garden all day! No way, it's so girly!

attributes.title: Trading Places I
attributes.description: That wasn't too hard! Especially with your help! I wonder how Felicia has been getting on with my work!

attributes.title: Trading Places II
attributes.description: Oh dear! Felicia left me instructions and according to them I have to crossbreed flowers. I have no idea on how to do this! Can you help me, so that Felicia won't laugh at me?

attributes.title: Trading Places II
attributes.description: Wow! Did you see that? Look, we've got a special flower!

attributes.title: Trading Places III
attributes.description: Ok! I think I can even win the bet, you know! All we need to do is take care of these little flowers when they need something! Look, I'll show you!

attributes.text: Help __total flowers with the UV Light

attributes.title: Trading Places III
attributes.description: These garden flowers are so delicate. I was scared about hurting them when I used the garden tools!

attributes.title: Trading Places IV
attributes.description: Remember the flower which you helped me crossbreed for the first time? We need to find another flower to crossbreed with this one! I still need to learn how to do this. Please help me one more time!

attributes.title: Trading Places IV
attributes.description: Yes, now we have one more resident for our garden! Grow, little guy! Become big and beautiful!

attributes.title: Trading Places V
attributes.description: I was planning to run to the fishing pier with my friends for a few hours, but these flowers need constant attention! I give Felicia credit, this job isn't as easy as I thought it would be. But I still want to win the bet!

attributes.title: Trading Places V
attributes.description: Nice! All flowers have had their fair share of my attention! Now I have some free time!

attributes.title: Trading Places VI
attributes.description: We have enough flowers in our garden! Time for some experiments! I will crossbreed flowers and try to get a totally new type of flower! Felicia will be stunned!

attributes.title: Trading Places VI
attributes.description: It's so peaceful here in this garden! No wonder Felicia spends hours here!

attributes.title: Trading Places VII
attributes.description: I need to free up some space in the garden. Can you help me decide which one I should sell? I am so attached to them now that I won't be able to make a choice!

attributes.title: Trading Places VII
attributes.description: Thank you for your help! Now we have more space and more coins! Gardening sure is an awesome thing!

attributes.title: Trading Places VIII
attributes.description: With all my gardening experiments, I'm now out of space in the garden again! Do you think some neighbors would like to help us take care of our flowers?

attributes.text: Place __total Friendship Flowers on a neighbor's Glasshouse plot

attributes.title: Trading Places VIII
attributes.description: I think Felicia won this time, but I don't mind. I hope she'll let me help her with the garden more often!

attributes.title: My new House!
attributes.description: We are such good friends, you must miss me a lot when I'm at my own farm, right? Never fear, I decided to stay near here and keep you company! But I want to build a house to live in, can you help me?

attributes.text: Place a Brown Wooden Chair in Darryl's House
Place __total Round Wooden Tables in Darryl's House

attributes.title: My new House!
attributes.description: Now we can add more space to the House! Let's make it bigger!

attributes.title: My new House!
attributes.description: I feel like the House is missing something... I think we need a kitchen! I've always wanted to learn to cook as well as Felicia! Her pancakes are to die for!

attributes.text: Prepare __total bowls of Roasted Tomato Soup

attributes.title: My new House!
attributes.description: Great! We can add another area now! Try to open the whole House - there's no such thing as too much living space, after all!

attributes.title: Felicia's Secret I
attributes.description: Darryl is always making fun of me that I cannot cook...Well, I've followed some cooking courses lately, and I am gonna give Grandma and Darryl a big surprise. But I will need to have a Kitchen!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has just found out a secret, can you guess what it is? Play family farm seaside to find out.

attributes.text: Unlock the first plot in the Building Area
Add __total tasks to the To-do List

attributes.title: Felicia's Secret I
attributes.description: Great we have a kitchen! Now let's prepare dinner! I'm sure they will love it!

attributes.title: Felicia's Secret II
attributes.description: Gorgonzola Baked Apples would be good to make, what do you think? Let's see, first we make the Honey Sauce! We need to get some Honey Dippers to keep my hands clean when gathering the honey.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s didn't want to get into a sticky situation, find out what they needed to carry on cooking by playing Family Farm Seaside. You can even help them out.

attributes.title: Felicia's Secret II
attributes.description: Phew, that was not too difficult! I was afraid It would turn out in a disaster just like during the cooking course...

attributes.title: Felicia's Secret III
attributes.description: Alright, now what do we need? Cheese apples right? So I need to pick some Apples and make some Buffalo Cheese.
attributes.opengraph_des: Do cheese and apples go together like %s and Family Farm Seaside?

attributes.title: Felicia's Secret III
attributes.description: Yummy! The cheese apples taste really good!!

attributes.title: Felicia's Secret IV
attributes.description: Hmm... Gorgonzola Baked Apples are nice, but we need to add something extra... I know what will go well with them, a few loaves of Wheat Bread!
attributes.opengraph_des: Are you hungry? %s just made some very tasty food. You can make some too; get cooking by playing Family Farm Seaside

attributes.title: Felicia's Secret IV
attributes.description: Mmm... the smell of Fresh Bread is so good!

attributes.title: Felicia's Secret V
attributes.description: Whoops, we have too much ingredients... Well I think I can make a few extra Gorgonzola Baked Apples and sell them!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has just sold some of their fantastic dishes whilst playing Family Farm Seaside and has made some coins for their farm. What would you spend the coins on?

attributes.text: Make 1500 coins by selling goods from the Barn

attributes.title: Felicia's Secret V
attributes.description: Grandma loved it! Darryl was amazed and astonished! See, I can cook!!

attributes.title: Begin to cook I
attributes.description: Grandma told me that every young lady should be able to cook to be a good housewife. I don't agree with this traditional way of thinking, but it sure is useful to be able to cook!
attributes.opengraph_des: An apple a day keeps the doctor away! %s just picked 8, they will be great to use in the Family Farm Seaside Kitchen, try now for free.

attributes.title: Begin to cook I
attributes.description: The first step is always the hardest, but you did it! Encourage your friends to start cooking.

attributes.title: Begin to cook II
attributes.description: That was easy: I think I am starting to get the hang of this. I'm sure I have a talent for cooking! Do you have an idea what to do with the apples?
attributes.opengraph_des: What wobbles and can't be trusted? %s? Jelly of course! Make some now in Family Farm Seaside

attributes.title: Begin to cook II
attributes.description: What a great idea! Apple Jelly is delicious. Suggest your friends try it and see what else you can make.

attributes.title: Begin to cook III
attributes.description: Oh no, look at my clothes! They are all dirty, I forgot to wear an apron. Could you put one on, while I change? And don't forget the ingredients for the next dish!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just made a really big mess in the kitchen, find out why and help others keep tidy by playing Family Farm Seaside.

attributes.title: Begin to cook III
attributes.description: I think I look so cute wearing this apron! What shall I do with all the extra fruit butter? Share and find out!

attributes.title: Begin to cook IV
attributes.description: Now we have the jelly, jam and butter. However we are still missing the bread. Hmm, what do we need to make some bread? Eggs, Flour and?
attributes.opengraph_des: That was hard work, %s got all the ingredients to make some delicious bread though. See how your bread will turn out, check out Family Farm Seaside.

attributes.title: Begin to cook IV
attributes.description: Milk of course! This bread will be really tasty! Tell your friends to get ready to taste some!

attributes.title: Begin to cook V
attributes.description: The bread is done, it looks delicious! We made some extra so we can sell what's left to buy more ingredients!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has just made some fresh delicious bread. Are you surprised they did not burn it? Test your skills by playing Family Farm Seaside

attributes.text: Sell __total Whole Oat Fruit Breads from the Barn

attributes.title: Begin to cook V
attributes.description: What a success! Tell you friends how great it is to produce something on your own!

attributes.title: Who loves tasty food I
attributes.description: Can you smell the delicious food? It's a shame grandma does not allow me to use the kitchen, I am too small! I wonder if Felicia would cook something for me if I bring her the correct ingredients.
attributes.opengraph_des: It's all about the preparation, what is %s is making? See what you can make with your ingredients in the Family Farm Seaside kitchen.

attributes.title: Who loves tasty food I
attributes.description: Awesome! She agreed to help me if I tell my friends about it. Can you help me?

attributes.title: Who loves tasty food II
attributes.description: Felicia said she is really good at making bread - I can't wait to taste it. What do you want on your bread?
attributes.opengraph_des: Do you like honey on fresh bread? %s just made some, are you hungry? Get baking in Family Farm Seaside now.

attributes.title: Who loves tasty food II
attributes.description: Yummy! Her cooking is so tasty. My friends will be jealous when they try it.

attributes.title: Who loves tasty food III
attributes.description: Bread and honey is tasty, I prefer sweeter things. It's better to be healthy though! What about making orange crumbles?
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just made some orange crumbles, find out what else you can make in the Family Farm Seaside kitchen.

attributes.title: Who loves tasty food III
attributes.description: Tasty and healthy! I made so much there is enough for a whole football team! What can we do with it all?

attributes.title: Who loves tasty food IV
attributes.description: There are too many sweets. Never mind, we can share them with our neighbors to help them out.
attributes.opengraph_des: Who has a sweet tooth? Opps %s made too many desserts, good job they can be sold in the Family Farm Seaside store though. Check out what else you can sell.

attributes.text: Fertilize __total times  on your neighbors' farms

attributes.title: Who loves tasty food IV
attributes.description: Sweets are even better when you share them with and help your friends! Share and tell all your friends how great it feels!

attributes.title: Who loves tasty food V
attributes.description: Now that they ate all the orange crumbles they are asking for more. Well, why not? Let's come up with some more sweets. Don't forget to save some for me!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is becoming a skilled pastry chef, they have made orange crumbles and no some fluffy muffins; just a few of the tasty options in Family Farm Seaside.

attributes.title: Who loves tasty food V
attributes.description: Wow! They nearly ate them all and look at Felicia... Looks like she is coming up with an idea. Share and find out what it can be!

attributes.title: Felicia's Dessert Shop I
attributes.description: Don't tell Darryl, but now I know what I want to make! Desserts and lots of them! I can sell them as well! The best idea would be to sell the desserts in the shop. Can you help me?
attributes.opengraph_des: What wobbles and can't be trusted? %s? Jelly of course! Make some now in Family Farm Seaside

attributes.title: Felicia's Dessert Shop I
attributes.description: Great. The apple jelly is just the beginning... Share and tell your friends!

attributes.title: Felicia's Dessert Shop II
attributes.description: People love cake, but it's difficult to eat as a snack. Muffins are more convenient and I am sure I can make them. The ingredients are nearly the same.
attributes.opengraph_des: What is %s making with flour and rye, find out by using the kitchen in Family Farm Seaside

attributes.title: Felicia's Dessert Shop II
attributes.description: That's all we need? Ask your friends, just to make sure...!

attributes.title: Felicia's Dessert Shop III
attributes.description: Great, we got everything. Let's bake the muffins and make some brochures so we can start to advertise them in the store.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has just started selling a new product; do you know what it is? Maybe you could help by providing some brochures in Family Farm Seaside

attributes.title: Felicia's Dessert Shop III
attributes.description: Super! In case it's not enough, you can spread the news and tell everybody about the new shop!

attributes.title: Felicia's Dessert Shop IV
attributes.description: I don't want to have an ordinary dessert shop! I have to try something new! People love cheese and apples! Why not combine them?
attributes.opengraph_des: Want to try something new? %s just made a new interesting dish and you can too in the Family Farm Seaside game

attributes.title: Felicia's Dessert Shop IV
attributes.description: So unusual. Do you think it will be an success? We should ask some friends to see what they think....

attributes.title: Felicia's Dessert Shop V
attributes.description: Oh no, Darryl ate all the bread? But we need some to sell it together with some jam. Ok, stay calm, we can fix this.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just avoided a crisis, someone at all the bread. Test your farming and baking skills in Family Farm Seaside.

attributes.title: Felicia's Dessert Shop V
attributes.description: Wow, so fast! Nothing to fear, now we have enough bread!

attributes.title: Felicia's Dessert Shop VI
attributes.description: I am so excited. Do you think they will like my dishes? Let's try to sell them and find out.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just sold their hand made desserts, think you can too? Find out by playing Family Farm Seaside.

attributes.text: Sell 4 Gorgonzola Baked Apples from the Barn
Sell 9 Light Muffins from the Barn

attributes.title: Felicia's Dessert Shop VI
attributes.description: Awesome! We sold everything so fast. Tell your friends about this success!

attributes.title: Felicia's Dessert Shop VII
attributes.description: Now I have space for new dishes! This time I want to use a lot of fruits and I already have an idea!!
attributes.opengraph_des: What has %s been making in the Family Farm Seaside kitchen? Perhaps it's something fruity, play the game to find out what dish is going to be so delicious.

attributes.title: Felicia's Dessert Shop VII
attributes.description: Do you want to know what Felicia will make with these? Share and keep playing to find out.

attributes.title: Felicia's Dessert Shop VIII
attributes.description: Perfect! Have you heard of Sunrise Porridge? I bet the customers will love it and it's easy to make so we can try to sell it right away.
attributes.opengraph_des: Everyone loves porridge; %s has just made some sunrise porridge. Want to make some too? Check out Family Farm Seaside.

attributes.text: Sell 4 lots Sunrise Porridge from the Barn

attributes.title: Felicia's Dessert Shop VIII
attributes.description: The dessert shop was a great idea! Can't wait for more things to cook...

attributes.title: Darryl cookbook I
attributes.description: Grandma is not at home! Help, I need to cook for myself, I know you will help me? Cornbread Meatloaf would be good dish to start with.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has just managed to cook some lovely meatloaf. Find out what other great dishes you can make in the Family Farm Seaside kitchen, start playing now.

attributes.title: Darryl cookbook I
attributes.description: Great, the sauce is ready!

attributes.title: Darryl cookbook II
attributes.description: Now comes the hard part: where can I find good Beef? Of course, our Limousin Cattle.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just managed to find some really good quality beef, find out how and use it in some great dishes by playing Family Farm Seaside.

attributes.title: Darryl cookbook II
attributes.description: Now we have some top quality Beef! Let's make something nice with it!

attributes.title: Darryl cookbook III
attributes.description: Alright, let's see what is the next step? First I need to produce some Grilled Flank Steaks, then some Cheese Burgers and finally I can make a few Cornbread Meatloafs with it. I'm excited.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has been busy in the kitchen, what has he made? Smells a bit like steak - find out what steak can be made by playing Family Farm Seaside now.

attributes.title: Darryl cookbook III
attributes.description: Ooo, this smells really good!!

attributes.title: Darryl cookbook IV
attributes.description: The Cornbread Meatloaf was delicious, but I'm still hungry! Let's make a Whole Oat Fruit Bread! We need to have Apple Jelly and Fruit Butter, right?
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just got some apples and cherries, but what for? Find out what you can make with these by playing Family Farm Seaside now.

attributes.title: Darryl cookbook IV
attributes.description: Great! We now have everything to finish the meal!

attributes.title: Darryl cookbook V
attributes.description: Cooking is so much fun! I really like toast with fruit butter. Why don't we make some fruit butter by ourselves?
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has just made some fruit butter to put on his toast. Find out what you can make by checking out the Kitchen in Family Farm Seaside now

attributes.title: Darryl cookbook V
attributes.description: Yummy! Homemade fruit butter tastes much better than the fruit butter they sell in supermarkets!

attributes.title: Darryl cookbook VI
attributes.description: Oh well, I can always have some milk. But first let's get the ingredients for the Whole Oat Fruit Bread. I still miss Oat Bread.
attributes.opengraph_des: Milk, eggs and flour, what has %s making in the Family Farm Seaside kitchen? Play and find out for yourself, it's got to be tasty.

attributes.title: Darryl cookbook VI
attributes.description: Alright, I have everything!

attributes.title: Darryl cookbook VII
attributes.description: I am starving! Let's quickly make the Oat Bread, so we can produce Whole Oat Fruit Bread!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s just made some oat fruit bread and it actually tastes good. See if you can make even more tasty dishes by playing Family Farm Seaside now.

attributes.text: Produce 8 loaves of Whole Oat Fruit Bread

attributes.title: Darryl cookbook VII
attributes.description: It smells so good!!

attributes.title: Darryl cookbook VIII
attributes.description: What?! Grandma left food in the refrigerator? So I actually didn't need to cook!! Shall I eat my own dish, or Grandma's one? You know what: I will sell mine! Nothing beats my Grandmas cooking.
attributes.opengraph_des: Don't you think nothing beats your family's cooking? %s just sold the food he made in the Family Farm Seaside store as the food made if Family Farm Seaside is always delicious.

attributes.text: Sell 8 Whole Oat Fruit Breads from the Barn
Sell 8 glasses of Orange Juice from the Barn

attributes.title: Darryl cookbook VIII
attributes.description: Grandma 's dish is really tasty! I still need to practice and have lots to learn to beat it!

attributes.title: Darryl's Cake Stall I
attributes.description: Did you see Darryl's stall outside? He is trying to sell some homemade stuff. I'm really curious what he made, can you go and take a look for me as I am busy with some cake preparations I promised I would do for Grandma.

attributes.title: Darryl's Cake Stall I
attributes.description: Darryl has done what? He destroyed Grandma's favourite vase? No wonder she is so upset, but what has that got to do with this stall?

attributes.title: Darryl's Cake Stall II
attributes.description: Ahh I see, he thinks he can get enough money to buy Grandma a new vase to replace the broken one and cheer her up. Come on, let's work together and make some food for him to sell!

attributes.title: Darryl's Cake Stall II
attributes.description: Great, that should be enough batter to help Darryl and fulfil the promise I made to grandma about the cakes.

attributes.title: Darryl's Cake Stall III
attributes.description: Let's bake something for Grandma first. Hmm, what do you think about cherry flan?

attributes.title: Darryl's Cake Stall III
attributes.description: I can't get enough of the smell from the fresh cherry flan I just made, Grandma will love it! Now let's help Darryl out for his stall.

attributes.title: Darryl's Cake Stall IV
attributes.description: If Darryl wants to sell something else in his stall it has to be easy to eat. Muffins will do the trick.

attributes.title: Darryl's Cake Stall IV
attributes.description: Voilà! Siblings don't have to fight. Now we need to bake one more cake and then help him sell it!

attributes.title: Darryl's Cake Stall V
attributes.description: I have never tried to make any Lychee Scones. Darryl's situation a good time to try it, I hope they sell otherwise he won't reach his target. Let's do it, it's always good to be positive!

attributes.title: Darryl's Cake Stall V
attributes.description: Finished! Now we can surprise Darryl with this sweet favour and help him to make Grandma smile!

attributes.title: Darryl's Cake Stall VI
attributes.description: Darryl is so happy! If Grandma could see how much it means to him, I am sure would forgive him straight away. She's not here, that's good though as we now have enough to sell and get a replacement vase!

attributes.text: Sell 10 Lychee Scones from the Barn
Sell 5 Light Muffins from the Barn
Sell 15000 coins worth of goods from the Barn

attributes.title: Darryl's Cake Stall VI
attributes.description: Made it! By working together we sold enough to replace Grandmas favourite vase, I knew people would like my Lychee Scones. Thank you!

attributes.title: Picnic Time I
attributes.description: The weather has been wonderful the last few days. It's a shame we haven't had the time to fully enjoy it. I know what we can do; we can organize a picnic to enjoy it. Let's start with the preparations.

attributes.title: Picnic Time I
attributes.description: That was hard work and it was only the preparations. Let's keep going and continue with the rest of the tasks.

attributes.title: Picnic Time II
attributes.description: Rice Krispies are delicious snacks for a picnic and I know Darryl loves them. Since we have already got the Rice and Oat, we can easily make some Rice Krispies now.

attributes.title: Picnic Time II
attributes.description: The Rice Krispies are cooked and they all look really tasty! I'm really tempted to eat one but we still have lots to do.

attributes.title: Picnic Time III
attributes.description: Bread is good idea for a picnic. I prefer to have something sweet on my bread and the blueberries look sweet and tasty this year. So why don't we make some Blueberry Jam?

attributes.title: Picnic Time III
attributes.description: I gave into temptation, I couldn't help myself and tried some of the Blueberry Jam, It's really delicious!

attributes.title: Picnic Time IV
attributes.description: I know a really beautiful and big park where we can have the picnic. I'm sure the kids will want to run around and play some games. We better prepare some snacks for them.

attributes.title: Picnic Time IV
attributes.description: This should be enough food, now let's think about the drinks.

attributes.title: Picnic Time V
attributes.description: I haven't seen my friends for such a long time and this is a great opportunity to catch up with them. I can't wait, we better prepare some wine.

attributes.title: Picnic Time V
attributes.description: We have the food and now we also have some drinks to compliment the food. I think we are all set for a lovely picnic. Exciting!

attributes.title: Picnic Time VI
attributes.description: Oh no, the weather forecast predicts rain for the next few days. I think we may have to cancel the picnic this time and rearrange. What a shame, at least we can sell the products we made!

attributes.text: Sell 30 bottles of Wine from the Barn
Sell 30 bottles of Champagne from the Barn
Sell 8 Chocolate Dream Bars from the Barn

attributes.title: Picnic Time VI
attributes.description: Typical weather! At least its good for the crops. We didn't have the picnic this time, but we can have it in the future!

attributes.title: Secret Pétanque I
attributes.description: Shh be quiet, my buddies and I are planning to have a secret pétanque game tonight. We need some man snacks, maybe a "manwich"?

attributes.title: Secret Pétanque I
attributes.description: Yes! All my friends are about to come and play in the evening while Grandma is having her daily nap!

attributes.title: Secret Pétanque II
attributes.description: Shhh...I don't want Grandma to know about our game as she will ruin our enjoyment with all her facts about Pétanque! We need more food!

attributes.title: Secret Pétanque II
attributes.description: Game on! It's time to throw the jack! We have a few hours to play and we won't be hungry because we ate so much! Thank's a lot!

attributes.title: Magic Almonds I
attributes.description: Darryl! Did you know that almonds are magic? Not only are they great to eat, they are great for your skin. You should try some!

attributes.title: Magic Almonds I
attributes.description: I wonder if almonds or cheese contain more energy? We can perform a chemistry experiment; let's get the microscope and Bunsen burner.

attributes.title: Magic Almonds II
attributes.description: The results: almonds are packed full of more energy compared to the cheese. They are also good for your heart and cholesterol as well as your skin, let's have some more.

attributes.title: Magic Almonds II
attributes.description: The omelet tastes great because of the added almonds. Food like this means I don't need to feel bad about having a lots of meals.

attributes.title: The Italian Job I
attributes.description: Si! I have Italian Ancestors, didn't you know? Call me "Mamma" but I would love some Tiramisu! I can quickly make some now.

attributes.title: The Italian Job I
attributes.description: Magnifico! I love the smell and it tastes so good!

attributes.title: The Italian Job II
attributes.description: Grandma's Italian relatives will stop by the farm to grab some fresh produce for their onward journey! Let's get ready for their arrival!

attributes.title: The Italian Job II
attributes.description: Fantastico! That's the first step done! Let's keep going, Presto, Presto!

attributes.title: The Italian Job III
attributes.description: They have arrived quickly "Ciao a  tutti quanti! Finalmente!"  Hurry! Let's make them happy!

attributes.title: The Italian Job III
attributes.description: They took everything we made which is great and they left with a big hug! Ciao, buon viaggio!

attributes.title: Darryl's New Game I
attributes.description: Darryl seems grumpy, I wonder why? Maybe Grandma has said something to him, I'll finish making these items for the store and then see what's going on.

attributes.title: Darryl's New Game I
attributes.description: Maybe I should use the lemons to make some lemonade to get rid of Darryl's bad mood. Let's try and find Grandma!

attributes.title: Darryl's New Game II
attributes.description: Grandma is free now, but I can't find Darryl. I'll pour her some champagne to try and get her in a good mood and then ask what's going on.

attributes.title: Darryl's New Game II
attributes.description: Grandma will definitely be in a happy mood with this champagne, I'll ask her what's going on, maybe I can even help.

attributes.title: Darryl's New Game III
