attributes.description: I found out! Darryl really wants a new toy but Grandma has said he needs to save up for it, so he's moody. If I need some new clothes I need to save too, I wish I could always go shopping.

attributes.title: Darryl's New Game III
attributes.description: I have an idea, let's sell this stuff to help Darryl get his toy. At least he can't get annoyed when I beat him at his game!

attributes.title: Darryls New Game IV
attributes.description: Darryl wants to buy a racket game, I'm glad it's not another video game because I can't play them. I know he will get really annoyed if I beat him hehe.

attributes.title: Darryl's New Game IV
attributes.description: That steak is really good quality from our farm, I know it will sell fast! I'll find out how much money Darryl has from Grandma.

attributes.title: Darryl's New Game V
attributes.description: Grandma has told me that Darryl has nearly half the money. He doesn't know I am helping him out yet. I can't wait to surprise him and help him get the game earlier than he is expecting, nearly there..

attributes.title: Darryl's New Game V
attributes.description: I could make so many good cakes from these ingredients! Oh well, it's really nice to help Darryl out and we can both play the game.

attributes.title: Darryl's New Game VI
attributes.description: After I make these last few items, we will have enough money and get to go shopping. Yey! I hope Grandma treats me to a new dress or hot chocolate when we go.

attributes.text: Sell 10 Cherry Flan from the Barn

attributes.title: Darryl's New Game VI
attributes.description: Shopping time, Yey. Fingers crossed to see if Grandma will treat me to a new dress

attributes.title: Darryl's New Game VII
attributes.description: It's so lovely of Felicia to help me out. Even though she beat me at our first game, I will sell a few more things and get her a bracelet to match her new dress Grandma got her.

attributes.text: Sell 10 Lychee Scones from the Barn

attributes.title: Darryl's New Game VII
attributes.description: She loved the bracelet. Game on! It's time for a rematch with Felicia, it's best of 3 games now.

attributes.title: Grandma's Orders I
attributes.description: Felicia's instincts were correct; more orders are on the way. We need to farm quickly to keep up, let's get farming!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is ready for your orders! Find out what you can order by Playing Family Farm Seaside now.
attributes.hint: Orders come on a special board, make sure you can see it on your farm

attributes.title: Grandma's Orders I
attributes.description: Good work! You can always trust Felicia's instincts. Share the good news with your friends!

attributes.title: Grandma's Orders II
attributes.description: Today's order has arrived, it's quite exciting. Let's check what it says on the order board. I wonder what we have to make!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is a good farmer! How about you? Test your skills and have fun by playing Family Farm Seaside
attributes.hint: Orders refresh every day. Make sure you finish it before it expires.

attributes.title: Grandma's Orders II
attributes.description: Well done! You are a good farmer, keep up the good work.

attributes.title: Grandma's Orders III
attributes.description: Shh, don't tell anyone but here are some secrets about the orders. You need to plant some vegetables or fruits to finish the first order. This is usually the easiest one to complete.
attributes.opengraph_des: First order completed! Find out what %s had to make, play Family Farm Seaside.
attributes.hint: You need clover to allow your bees to produce honey.

attributes.title: Grandma's Orders III
attributes.description: Now you can sell the clovers to finish the first order and then you can get some exp and order points.

attributes.title: Grandma's Orders IV
attributes.description: Hey, you need some machines or animals to finish the second order. For the third order, you need to cook it in the kitchen.
attributes.opengraph_des: %s has just finished today's order, make sure you get yours done as well in Family Farm Seaside.
attributes.hint: Machines make it much easier to complete orders.

attributes.text: Check the order board and finish the order

attributes.title: Grandma's Orders IV
attributes.description: Well Done! You have finished today's order. When you finish all three orders you get 10 bonus order points.

attributes.title: Grandma's Orders V
attributes.description: I have shared my top tips with you so I think you should be able to complete the orders by yourself. I bet you can finish them, good luck!
attributes.opengraph_des: Family Farm Seaside wants to give %s a big reward and you can help. Play Family Farm Seaside and give him a helping hand.
attributes.hint: Check your farm every day for new orders.

attributes.text: Wait and complete the next day's order

attributes.title: Grandma's Orders V
attributes.description: If you get enough points you will get the BIG REWARD. I look forward to you receiving the final reward.

attributes.title: Grandma's Orders I
attributes.description: Felicia's instincts were correct; more orders are on the way. We need to farm quickly to keep up, let's get farming!
attributes.opengraph_des: %s is ready for your orders! Find out what you can order by Playing Family Farm Seaside now.
attributes.hint: Orders come on a special board, make sure you can see it on your farm

attributes.text: Unlock the second plot in the Building Area

attributes.title: Grandma's Orders I
attributes.description: Good work! You can always trust Felicia's instincts. Share the good news with your friends!

attributes.title: Mother’s Day 1
attributes.description: Felicia heard that August is the month of Mother’s love in Thailand. It celebrates motherhood and it is a time to appreciate mothers and mother figures. Let find something to surprise grandma with. What should we do?

attributes.title: Mother’s Day 1
attributes.description: Great food is the best way to start your day! We have plenty of energy now!

attributes.title: Mother’s day 2
attributes.description: I think we have to cook something special for grandma ,but what should we do then ? ….Oh wait !!! Darryl just told me that we have a lot of orders to finish, but we don’t have enough time to do it ,Anyone can help?

attributes.title: Mother’s day 2
attributes.description: Alright, let's finish it soon. Grandma is coming back. Hey...Darryl! Come he to brainstorm!

attributes.title: Mother’s day 3
attributes.description: Grandma really love the dish that made from fish. You know fish is really good for  health. it ‘s time to be a fisherman  again . Darryl  Please don’t tell grandma where I am gonna go and  help me  to get some lemon …. I will cook  something spicy and good for health

attributes.title: Mother’s day 3
attributes.description: These recipes made from fresh ingredients in our farm. So delicious!!

attributes.title: Mother’s day 4
attributes.description: Yeah..Grandma seems like our surprise so much. Wow..Smell of jasmin in the farm is so fresh and sweet! Shall we use them to make some dessert for grandma. I’m sure she will love it. That’s so great!! Today, Grandma don’t have to do anything. She can have a rest for a whole day coz we will manage everything for her.

attributes.title: Mother’s day 4
attributes.description: Everything done , we've all had a nice time today.Everybody! Don’t forget to be nice to your Mom on this mother’s day!

attributes.title: Grandma's Present I
attributes.description: Grandma's Birthday is coming up and I saw a cookbook yesterday that she will love! But it is a bit expensive! There was an ad in the local paper that they're searching for a waitress in the Coffee House!

attributes.text: Place a Coffee House on your farm
Sell products worth __total Coins from the Barn

attributes.title: Grandma's Present I
attributes.description: The Coffee House job was really fun and I made some good money! More than enough to get the cookbook! Can't wait to see Grandma's face!

attributes.title: Grandma's Present II
attributes.description: Grandma loved the Cookbook so much, she got a bit too excited and bought a new stove! Let's see what she will cook for us!

attributes.text: Place a Stove House on your farm

attributes.title: Grandma's Present II
attributes.description: Wow the dishes are delicious! Let's practice more to make them even faster and better!

attributes.title: Open for Business!
attributes.description: You can now trade with your neighbors at the Flea Market and trade internationally with all farmers using the E-Mart!

attributes.text: Have a Flea Market on your farm
Have an E-Mart on your farm
Produce __total Cheese Burgers and sell them in the Flea Market

attributes.title: Flea Market and E-Mart
attributes.description: Sell your goods at your Flea Market! Advertise your products to sell them internationally on the E-Mart!

attributes.title: My First Pet 1
attributes.description: Last night I had a wonderful dream! I dreamed that I adopted a very cute dog. This dream is still so vivid in my memory... Now I wonder, why don't we have pets actually?

attributes.text: Have a Pet House on your farm

attributes.title: Pet House
attributes.description: How cute our pet looks walking on the path! I promise I will take good care of my new pet!

attributes.title: My First Pet 2
attributes.description: Do you know pets will only walk around on the paths? We already have paths on the farm... I can't wait to see our pet!

attributes.text: Have a Pet on your farm

attributes.title: Pet House
attributes.description: The more pets you have on your farm, the more chests you can find!

attributes.title: My First Pet 4
attributes.description: People from around the world heard about our new pet house and they would love to pay a visit! Let's welcome the guests!

attributes.text: Have a Guest Center on your farm
Invite the group of guests to the farm

attributes.title: Guest Center
attributes.description: This will be a good business! When the new area in the Guest Center opens, we will have all kinds of new guests!

attributes.title: My First Pet 3
attributes.description: I think we played with our pet too much. They look a bit tired... We can let them rest in the pet house and serve some healthy, organic pet food.

attributes.title: Pet Food
attributes.description: Our pet looks so happy after eating! When pets have no stamina, they need rest and food!

attributes.title: Landscaping
attributes.description: Look at our farm. I think we can do a better job making it pretty for our pet and the new guests who will come to visit.

attributes.title: Landscape Points
attributes.description: Remember: the higher the landscape points, the happier our pets and guests will be!

attributes.title: Factory
attributes.description: In the Factory, we can forge equipment with abilities and make our pet more powerful!

attributes.text: Place a Factory on the ground
Forge __total Equipment (Check the materials in your Giftbox)

attributes.title: Factory
attributes.description: In the Factory, you can also disassemble equipment you don't like to get some materials back!

attributes.title: Farm Management I
attributes.description: Dad has been thinking about how to make the Island Farm more prosperous. Felicia and I have decided to help Dad and manage the Farm better.

attributes.title: Farm Management I
attributes.description: The first step is to grow as many plants as possible!

attributes.title: Farm Management II
attributes.description: If we plant lots of plants the Island Farm will flourish! Hmmm, do you think something is missing? Let's make some Farm products!

attributes.title: Farm Management II
attributes.description: Now the Island Farm produces its own plants and products!

attributes.title: Farm Management III
attributes.description: Ok, we have great plans but not enough money. Dad suggested that we craft and sell products from the Hardware Store for a big profit!

attributes.text: Sell __total Lag Bolts from the Barn

attributes.title: Farm Management III
attributes.description: Great! We made enough money to purchase more machines and animals!

attributes.title: Farm Management IV
attributes.description: So, now we have enough money. I had a discussion with Dad and Felicia, and we decided to raise precious trees and animals on the Island Farm!

attributes.title: Farm Management IV
attributes.description: Wow, the Panda feels so soft and the Red Sandalwood looks so grand!

attributes.title: Farm Management V
attributes.description: We've really improved the Island Farm and it looks great! How can we attract guests and visitors to our Island Farm? Dad suggested that we produce local handicrafts.

attributes.title: Farm Management V
attributes.description: These handicrafts sold really well! Every guest and visitor we had raved about our new Island Farm!

attributes.title: Woodworking Day I
attributes.description: Do you really think that I'm good at woodworking? It's all from Dad's teaching!

attributes.text: Sell __total Lag Bolts from the Barn

attributes.title: Woodworking Day I
attributes.description: Of course many materials are needed for woodworking!

attributes.title: Woodworking Day II
attributes.description: So, today I will teach Felicia woodworking. First, I will need to eat something...

attributes.title: Woodworking Day II
attributes.description: Did you see that squirrel eating a chestnut? So cute!

attributes.title: Woodworking Day III
attributes.description: I have already prepared the wood, let's see if Felicia can handle it!

attributes.text: Craft __total Barrel Bomb in the Workshop

attributes.title: Woodworking Day III
attributes.description: Wow! She has crafted bombs already!

attributes.title: Woodworking Day IV
attributes.description: It's hard to admit this, but I can see that Felicia is very good. Let's take a rest, we have more tasks to do in the Workshop!

attributes.title: Woodworking Day IV
attributes.description: Hotdogs are always my favorite!

attributes.title: Woodworking Day V
attributes.description: Now we have produced items, let's make a profit!

attributes.title: Woodworking Day V
attributes.description: Nice job! Father will be proud of us!

attributes.title: Woodworking Day VI
attributes.description: Wow, it's already time to go to bed. Can you please help me prepare a nice bath?

attributes.title: Woodworking Day VI
attributes.description: Our Farm soap is the best! Thanks Farmer for helping me today!

attributes.title: Chocolate Frenzy I
attributes.description: Hey, Farmer! You might already know that I have a sweet tooth... But do you know my biggest weakness? That's right! I'd do ANYTHING for a piece of chocolate!

attributes.title: Chocolate Frenzy I
attributes.description: White chocolate, dark chocolate... I'll have it either way!

attributes.title: Chocolate Frenzy II
attributes.description: I've been researching the history of chocolate for a school project and I learned some really cool things! Did you know that the ancient Maya and Aztecs knew how to grow cacao trees and drank chocolate?

attributes.title: Chocolate Frenzy II
attributes.description: Yes! The name "chocolate" comes from the Aztec word "xocoatl"!

attributes.title: Chocolate Frenzy III
attributes.description: While the Aztecs liked to drink liquid chocolate, I prefer it in a solid form! Just imagine a smooth milk chocolate bar with crisp, crunchy peanuts... I'm drooling!

attributes.title: Chocolate Frenzy III
attributes.description: Grandma says too much sugar isn't good for me, so I'm only allowed one piece a day...

attributes.title: Chocolate Frenzy IV
attributes.description: But... Chocolate Creme Puffs are not technically chocolate bars, right? I'm sure Grandma won't mind if I have one... Or five! Let's go to the Kitchen!

attributes.title: Chocolate Frenzy IV
attributes.description: Om nom nom, delicious! Oops, I think Grandma's coming! Run for your life!

attributes.title: Ice Cream Stand I
attributes.description: Have you heard, Farmer? The ice cream truck owner broke his arm and won't come to town for the whole summer! It's a disaster!

attributes.text: Have an Ice Cream Machine on your farm

attributes.title: Ice Cream Stand I
attributes.description: Worry not, my dear friend! Felicia is coming to the rescue!

attributes.title: Ice Cream Stand II
attributes.description: I don't have a truck, but Daddy promised to help me nail together a simple ice cream stand! Darryl and I will take turns selling ice cream on weekends and save the town!

attributes.title: Ice Cream Stand II
attributes.description: I can also sell some other farm products to make extra money! Tulip Perfumes are uber trendy this summer!

attributes.title: Ice Cream Stand III
attributes.description: A quick survey at school gave me some insight into this season's most popular Ice Cream flavors! We'd better stock up on plums and limes, Farmer!

attributes.title: Ice Cream Stand III
attributes.description: That's right, goodbye plain old vanilla and chocolate! Fruity flavors are HOT right now!

attributes.title: Ice Cream Stand IV
attributes.description: My personal favorite is our new peach flavor! Don't tell anyone, but I have a secret rule - for every scoop sold, I get to eat one! Yummy!

attributes.title: Ice Cream Stand IV
attributes.description: After the whole day I have a little bit of a brain freeze, hehe! Thanks for your help, Farmer!
